text: The first women's magazine was published in Malaysia in 1932. In the 2000s there were nearly fifty local titles addressing women in the country. These magazines also include those having an Islamic perspective. Some international women's magazines are also published in Malaysia. One of them is Elle Malaysia, which was first published in March 2014. Another one, Women’s Health, was started in April 2015. Comic magazines and film magazines are also common in Malaysia. The following is an incomplete list of current and defunct magazines published in Malaysia. They may be published in Malay or in other languages, including English and Chinese. ==A== *Aliran Monthly *Aswaq ==B== *Bandwidth Street Press ==G== *Galaxie *Gempak Starz *Glam * Glam Lelaki ==F== *female ==H== *Her World * Hijabista ==M== *Malaysia Insider *Motor Trader Magazine ==N== * Nur * Nuyou ==P== *The Peak ==R== *The Rocket *Roda-Roda ==S== *Suasana Bintang Filem ==T== *Third World Resurgence ==U== *Utusan Konsumer ==W== *Wanita ==See also== * List of newspapers in Malaysia ==References== * Malaysia
title: List of magazines in Malaysia
